# Courses I've Taken
<!-- <i class="fa fa-star-o"></i> -->
* **[Machine Learning](https://www.coursera.org/learn/machine-learning)** by [Coursera](https://www.coursera.org) and Stanford University
    + **My Rating**: <i class="fa fa-star"></i><i class="fa fa-star"></i><i class="fa fa-star"></i><i class="fa fa-star"></i><i class="fa fa-star"></i>
    + **Cost**: $102 (for certificate / free to audit)
    + **Time to Complete**: 11 weeks
    + **Comments**: This is a great course for understanding how different algorithms work; I would like to take this course again

* **Computing for Data Analysis** (no longer offered) by [Coursera](https://www.coursera.org) and John Hopkins University
    + **My Rating**: <i class="fa fa-star"></i><i class="fa fa-star"></i><i class="fa fa-star"></i><i class="fa fa-star"></i><i class="fa fa-star"></i>
    + **Cost**: free to audit
    + **Time to Complete**: 4 weeks
    + **Comments**: The courses now seem to make up the [Data Science Specialization](https://www.coursera.org/specializations/jhu-data-science) with a suggested timeline of 9 months
    
    
* **[Maps and the Geospatial Revolution](https://www.coursera.org/learn/geospatial)** by [Coursera](https://www.coursera.org) and The Pennsylvania State University
    + **My Rating**: <i class="fa fa-star"></i><i class="fa fa-star"></i><i class="fa fa-star"></i><i class="fa fa-star"></i><i class="fa fa-star"></i>
    + **Cost**: $63 (for certificate / free to audit)
    + **Time to Complete**: 5 weeks
    + **Comments**: This is a great course for understanding how different algorithms work; I plan to take this course again
